mapper.insert: insert into event_finish_list (event_id, event_type, event_owner, event_date, company_id, project_id, staff_id, payment_id) values (#{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select event_id, event_type, event_owner, event_date, company_id, project_id, staff_id, payment_id from event_finish_list
